attributes.action: Religion should be a choice from 16 years of age. Not forced upon babies.
attributes.additional_details:
Religion can alter a person's entire life.
Why shouldn't they decide who or of they believe in a particular one?
attributes.background:
We have choices in life to aid our own pursuit of hapiness, except religion.
Yes, you have an option later in life to switch, but this is rarely done, in exceptional individual cases.
..
Brain washing a baby into your beliefs is a form of abuse.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition as it does not ask the UK Government or Parliament to carry out a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
